name: blog
description: 1. Post can be created. On creating a blog post, blog image field must be entered(image) and the author's image field(authorImage). 2. Blog post can be updated. On updating a post, if the blogs image or author's image is change,the new image will be updated and the old one deleted. 3. Blog post can be deleted. On deleting a post, the image associated to that post will be deleted. 4. You can get a single blog post.
author: mr-chidex
